desc.glhan: <0><0>I have taken part in Gameloft AI Contest 2013, I finished at Quater Final (rank #4~8). I then soon joined Gameloft later on March 2014.<1>Deeply immersed in international environment, my English ability improved significantly. Thanks to that, earlier in 2021, I took the TOEIC English test and achieved 945/990 points.<2>Started out as a C++ Game Programmer, I developed my interest in Computer Graphics. I am well trained in OpenGL, shader programming and various graphics debugging tools.<3>I was in charge of gameplay programming and graphics optimization in the following games (all based on C++ and OpenGL):<1><0>Sharkdash, built using 2D in-house engine.<1>Ice Age Adventures, built using in-house 3D engine. <2>Brothers in Arms 3, built using Irrlicht-based in-house engine (3D).<3>Order and Chaos 2, 3D MMORPG, built using in-house engine.<4>Disney Magic Kingdom, built using Irrlicht-based in-house engine (3D).
desc.fpt: <0><0>I joined FPT Software on June 2016 and lead a team of 5 challenging a C++ project with 2 millions lines of code. That was a migration project, bringing an old 32-bit based system to 64-bit. I was in charge of building custom developement tools (CLI) for the team. I did review other member's code to ensure source code quality.<1>I developed application for an entertainment system running on Automobile devices (in parnership with LG). That was media playing application, built with Qt. I am in charge of feature implementation and overall performance optimization.<2>Over the course of 2 years at FPT Software, I have received various training on Project Management. I learned how to manage a small team and was pretty successful at it.<3>I was received honorable mention as Best Rookie of The Year 2016.
